Hi everybody. Does anybody know of a mod that enables the player to change the root part in flight?

I've run into a problem where USI Konstruction cannot merge two sections, because the construction port have become root part when I decoupled my vessel. I know I can send up a new section (rather expensive!) and that is what I've done so far. But changing the root part in flight would be far nicer solution.
Only solution I know is to try attaching/detaching parts via KIS - it'll have to regenerate the part tree, and sometimes that changes the root.

Edited May 7, 2017 by Overland

I just run into this problem and did this:

- right click the desired command module
- select "control from here"
- immediately after that pick "rename vehicle" in same menu
- change type of vehicle to something different
- esc and go to tracking station
 

After you return to vehicle, it should focus on center of mass and control from that new command module.
